attributes.action: To make it legal for 15 year olds to start part time work if they chose to
attributes.background: If a 15 year old is wanting work, they are obviously mature enough to act sensible and responsibly in a work place. Therefore they should be given a chance to work if they choose to so they can gain work experience for the future.

rejection.details:
Under current law, 15 year olds can work part-time with certain restrictions. You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/child-employment/restrictions-on-child-employment 

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government or Parliament to change the restrictions applied to 15 year olds who work, if that's what you would like to happen.
